features: Package Content Quick View: you will receive a total of 120 sheets of pastel printer paper in 12 styles, measuring about 11 x 8.5 inches/ 28 x 21.6 cm each, double printed, enough to meet your various writing needs
Pastel Gradient Stationary Paper: add a decorative and personal touch to your craft projects, party or wedding invitations, or greeting cards with this cute colored lined paper set

Printer Compatible: our decorative printer paper is made of quality paper that is printer friendly and compatible with most laser or inkjet printers, both available for business and personal use, bringing a lot of convenience to you

Multiple Applied: our lined stationary writing paper is clearly printed, applicable for pens, markers, stamps, or paint, proper for handwriting, drawing, calligraphy, home, school, office, classrooms, shops, weddings and so forth

Gifts to Share: due to the qualified material and colorful design, the colorful printer paper is suitable for sending to your family, fellows, students, classmates, coworkers on birthday, weddings, holidays, back to school days and so on, enhancing your relationships with them
body.description: Features: Each stationary paper for writing letters is about 11 x 8.5 inches/ 28 x 21.6 cm, which provides enough space for you to write things. It is light in weight and portable, fitting well into your bag or backpack to carry around for handy usage. The stationary paper 8.5 x 11 is easy and practical to use, suitable for taking class notes, sorting out mistakes, writing letters, sketching, and making daily plans, would be nice back to school stationery supplies. Specifications: Material: paper Color: as pictures shown Size: about 11 x 8.5 inches/ 28 x 21.6 cm Package includes: 120 Sheets of pastel gradient stationery paper Notes: Manual measurement, please allow slight errors on size. The color may exist a slight difference due to different screen displays.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute and Great Gift
reviews.reviewText: Bought this for my mom as a gift and she absolutely loves it. Her penpals always say how cool the paper is. Has had no issues with rips or bleed. Easy to write on.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Not impressed...I have bought many versions of stationery paper from Amazon.com...but this one leaves a LOT (for me) to be desired. It arrived "loose-leaf" with a skinny elastic band around the bundle -& NO cardboard back support ! - in a much larger plastic bag , which had a label (I assume to thier workers) 'not to seperate but to be sold as a set'.(??) The pages had shifted often, elastic band sheared ragged edges of some sheets. Nearly all sheets had dog-eared corner(s), too! This paper itself is extremely thin/lightweight. The lines are SO widely spaced it looks like pre-school paper! Spacing measures half an inch wide!!Certainly will not recommend and- lesson learned- will not buy again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Water color paper
reviews.reviewText: I love this paper. Great quality nice thickness and a nice assortment of colors. It was perfect for the job I had uses it for. Beautiful.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Low quality paper
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Cons:1) the paper is thin, easily damaged and some sides and corners are already damaged.2) plastic bag it comes in is small. Don’t pull them all out at once unless you are very careful.3) very wide ruled.Pros:1) lined on both sides2) Variety of colors3) Good price for the quantity of sheets.
